LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF

My name is Darko, I am 25 years old and live in Skopje, Macedonia. I am an enthusiastic person, aspiring to become a full-stack developer. I am very motivated and eager to learn new things with the intent of improving in every field, especially in the field of programming and computer science.

I am currently enrolled in last year of studies at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering & Information Technologies (field of telecommunications), but also attending a front-end code academy, learning new things and technologies on a daily basis.
